paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 55.5% male; mean age at onset 39.7 years

individual_records.phenotype_details: symptomatic with lower limb sensory/motor deficits
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patients with ATTRv in THAOS with recorded nerve conduction values were included.

functional_data.summary: Nerve conduction studies indicate progressive deterioration in nerve conduction.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical data.
variants.additional_notes: The predominant TTR genotype was Val30Met.
key_quotes: Patients with ATTRv in THAOS with recorded nerve conduction values were included.
The most common genotypes were Val30Met (p.Val50Met; 63.4%)

tables_processed.table_caption: Demographic characteristics of patients with ATTRv amyloidosis and nerve conduction studies at enrollment in THAOS

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text and tables.
